General.Name: Hariom Pipe Industries Limited
General.Description: Hariom Pipe Industries Limited manufactures and sells iron and steel products in India. It offers mild steel pipes, tubes, and billets; galvanized iron pipes, and hot and cold rolled pipes; HR skelps/coils; galvanized, HRPO, cold rolled full hard steel, and cold rolled close annealed coils; metal crash barriers and multiple profiles; and custom-made scaffolding solutions for the construction industry. The company offers its products for various infrastructural and industrial applications. Hariom Pipe Industries Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
